short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful homescreen extension that shows newsArticles when you open a new tab or window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Useful  extension that shows newsArticles when you open a new tab or window. They will be different all the time

NewsArticles are powered from wingztv.com

[This application is in BETA phase]
